thread.title: Elon Musk Says He Wants To Send Two Around The Moon By 2018
thread.title_full: Elon Musk Says He Wants To Send Two People Around The Moon By 2018

author: Dan Vergano
title: Elon Musk Says He Wants To Send Two Around The Moon By 2018
text:
View this image ›
Gregg Newton / AFP / Getty Images
ID: 10608389 Two people have paid Elon Musk’s SpaceX rocket firm an undisclosed amount to shoot them around the moon on a Falcon Heavy space rocket flight late in 2018.
Fly me to the moon ... Ok https://t.co/6QT8m5SHwn
— Elon Musk (@elonmusk) ID: 10608627 Announced at a Monday briefing , the proposal to circle two unidentified customers around the moon follows past audacious moves by Musk, ranging from now standard landings of rocket stages to sending an unmanned “Red Dragon” crew vehicle to Mars.
“They have already paid a significant deposit to do a moon mission,” according to a SpaceX statement . The Federal Aviation Administration created new rules allowing for US space tourism in 2016.
The trip would send the two people aboard a Dragon space capsule around the moon. The capsule was developed with NASA to send astronauts to the International Space Station. The news comes as NASA contemplates a separate “EM-1” crewed moon trip for its SLS rocket in 2018.
“By also flying privately crewed missions, which NASA has encouraged, long-term costs to the government decline and more flight reliability history is gained, benefiting both government and private missions,” SpaceX said.
Musk founded SpaceX in 2002, with the goal of making humanity “interplanetary,” and has spoken often of his hopes of colonizing Mars.
